details.title: NGSI entity operator
details.description: This operator allows you to sort NGSI entites by specified attribute.

preference.name: prop_name
preference.label: Attribute
preference.description: Attribute to be key when sorting

preference.name: send_nulls
preference.label: Send Nulls
preference.description: Enable this option to propagate null values, leave it disable to filter null events

inputendpoint.name: entityInput
inputendpoint.label: In
inputendpoint.description: Received entities will be sorted by specified attribute

outputendpoint.name: entityOutput
outputendpoint.label: Out
outputendpoint.description: Entities filtered from the received entities
